product_name: Earth HarborAhoy Love Nourishing Milky Cleanser
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackRefillableFeel the love with Earth Harbor's Ahoy Love Nourishing Milky Cleanser - a velvety-to-frothy treasure that comfortably purifies and gives skin a bouncy glow.
details: DetailsBenefitsDeeply CleansesSoftensHydratesInvigoratesFeaturesCarbon Neutral + Plastic NegativeFormulated by a Toxicologist + Herbalist Without Adding: GMOs, Dyes, Artificial Fragrances, Other Synthetic ChemicalsAllergy Tested1% For The PlanetWoman OwnedBenefits All Skin TypesKey IngredientsSUPER SEAWEED COMPLEX vitamin-rich nourishment + smooths & softensBOTANIC AHAs gentle, effective exfoliation + rejuvenates glowHIBISCUS FLOWER protects from environmental damage + brightensGREEN TEA potent antioxidant + calms skinPLANT LIPIDS powerfully dissolve impurities + bestow youthful bounceEUCALYPTUS reduces inflammation + gives cooling sensationItem 2626023How To UseApply to wet or dry skin; massage over face and rinse clean, focusing especially on dry or congested areas. Use morning and night (an AM must-have for all skin types).IngredientsAqua (Water), Cetearyl Olivate (Olive-Derived Emulsifier)*, Sorbitan Olivate (Olive-Derived Emulsifier)*, Glycerin (Coconut-Derived Humectant)*, Isoamyl Laurate (Plant-Derived Emollient)*, Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil**, Attalea Speciosa (Babassu) Oil**, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Butter**, Cetearyl Alcohol (Coconut-Derived Emulsifier)*, Cetearyl Glucoside (Coconut-Derived Emulsifier)*, Coco Glucoside (Coconut-Derived Surfactant)*, Lactobacillus/ Nereocystis Luetkeana (Seaweed) Ferment Filtrate**, Xanthan Gum (Plant-Derived Thickener)*, Laminaria Digitata (Seaweed) Extract*, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Extract*, Hibiscus Rosa-Sinensis (Hibiscus Aha) Extract*, Eucalyptus Globulus (Eucalyptus) Leaf Oil*, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergaptene-Free Bergamot) Oil*, Lactic Acid (Plant-Derived Aha)*, Benzyl Alcohol (Naturally-Occurring Preservative)*, Dehydroacetic Acid (Plant Vinegar-Derived Preservative)*, Phytic Acid (Seaweed-Derived Antioxidant)*, Corallina Officinalis (Red Seaweed) Extract*, Azadirachta Indica (Neem) Extract*, Coccinia Grandis (Ivy Gourd) Extract*, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Extract*, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Extract*, Ocimum Tenuiflorum (Tulsi) Extract*, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract*.**Certified Organic.*Non-Gmo.
how_to_use: Apply to wet or dry skin; massage over face and rinse clean, focusing especially on dry or congested areas. Use morning and night (an AM must-have for all skin types).

reviews.headline: Horrible
reviews.comments: I wear mascara and eyebrow gel only for day to day makeup. I do NOT use waterproof products. This doesn't do anything, it's on par with water for cleansing my face. Waste of money and horrible packaging

reviews.headline: I think the product itself is excellent
reviews.comments: But the container it comes in, Not good! It need to be sold in a different type of container, (small jar container, maybe).  The product does not dispense correctly out of the bottle.  It keeps clogging in the dispenser, then nothing comes out of the bottle.

reviews.headline: Changed ingredients
reviews.comments: Ever since they started showing up in more stores and changed from jar to bottle, they've changed ingredients and not this us super drying. Makes my skin flake. Also now you can't get all the product out.

reviews.headline: Great!
reviews.comments: I love this product! I use it daily along with multiple other Earth Harbor products. This new regime of these natural products has transformed my skin!

reviews.headline: My favorite gentle cleanser but the new bottle is horrible
reviews.comments: I have used this cleanser for awhile, and it used to come in a glass jar which made it easy to get all the product out. Because this is a thick consistency, the new bottle with the pump is a horrible idea. It stops working about half way through the bottle.

faceoff_positive.comments: I FINALLY found a daily face cleanser that I love!  I think they changed the formula a bit because the fragance before was so fresh and lovely-smelling, it's still great, but doesn't have that same lovely smell.  It is creamy and gentle, perfect for every day.  The only downside is the bottle.  It used to come in a glass jar, which was perfect, but they switched to the bottle and now sometimes you can't even get the product out with the pump (as was the case on my latest order).  It is kind of annoying to try to fish it out with the pump stick, but the product is so lovely.  I REALLY wish they would go back to the jar though!  Otherwise it would be 5 stars!
faceoff_positive.headline: I FINALLY found a daily f

faceoff_negative.comments: I love so many of the EH gems and I wanted to love this cleanser but it just isn't working for me. Like many other users, the pump/packaging has been extremely frustrating. I gave it -2 weeks to see if it just needed to work its way through but I think the pump is designed for the viscosity of a liquid, not a rich cream like this.   I am also bummed that this doesn't remove my makeup (specifically eyeliner and mascara) very well. I wear Erin's Face mascara and Elate eyeliner (clean beauty, nothing waterproof) and I still need to use a cleansing balm on my eyes after using this cleanser (the cleanser I used before this took everything off super easily and rinsed away very clean).   I will continue buying EH Azure, Celestine, Anchor, and Siren Silk but will probably go back to Plaine Peoducts for my cleanser.
faceoff_negative.headline: I love so many of the EH
